Logical pick device simulation algorithms for the core system
items.abstract: <jats:p>The specifications for logical pick devices in the Status Report of the Graphics Standards Planning Committee are reviewed followed by a short, general discussion of Pick simulation. Then, the simulation of Picks by point selection and segment display file processing is discussed in detail with emphasis on the improvement of performence using extents. Finally, the picking algorithms of two major Core implementations are outlined.</jats:p>

title: Shallow core snow chemistry of Athabasca Glacier, Alberta
items.abstract: <jats:p> Examination of concentrations of several chemical species in a 7.37 m deep pit excavated close to the 1978 summer equilibrium line altitude (ELA) of Athabasca Glacier (2694 m) suggests that: (1) aerosol forms of NO<jats:sub>3</jats:sub><jats:sup>−</jats:sup>, PO<jats:sub>4</jats:sub><jats:sup>3−</jats:sup>, and reactive SiO<jats:sub>2</jats:sub> entered this area in diluted concentrations compared to values for Edmonton, Alberta, the closest heavily populated area; (2) Fe values were similar to those in Edmonton; and (3) the glacier's yearly net mass balance for the sample area was 1.5 and 2.4–2.7 m H<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>O equivalent for the 1976–1977 and 1977–1978 mass balance years. </jats:p>
